name: Dog and Horse: Jumping Jack
description:
Jack the fiend has made it his life's work to spread sick pills from the top of mount wierditude!! 

Dog and his best friend Horse don't like this guy, no one does. 

Navigate to the top as either of them with rockets, springs, and most importantly platforms  to stop Jack and his deadly plan. 

Obviously he's not making any of it easy, so watch out for spikes, breaking platforms and the invisible ones and knock that villain out of the sky. 

Play with the arrow buttons.
